pt.iscte.dcti.poo.sokoban.starter

Class BarraEstado

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.iscte.dcti.poo.sokoban.starter.BarraEstado

  • public class BarraEstado
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BarraEstado(int nivel, int movimentos, int energia)
      This constructs a StateBar with a specified initial energy for the player, the number of moves initialized with 0 and the current level

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void aumentaEnergia()
      This method increases the amount of energy in 80
      void decrementaEnergia()
      This method decreases the amount of energy in 4.
      int getEnergia()
      This returns the amount of energy that the player can still spend
      int getMovimentos()
      This returns the number of movements done by the player
      int getNivel()
      This returns the current level where's the player
      void incrementaMovimentos()
      This increases in 1 the number of moves
      void mostraEstado()
      This method shows the level, the energy and the number of moves in the game window

    • Constructor Detail

      • BarraEstado

        public BarraEstado(int nivel,
                   int movimentos,
                   int energia)
        This constructs a StateBar with a specified initial energy for the player, the number of moves initialized with 0 and the current level
        Parameters:
        nivel - the current level of the game
        movimentos - the number of movements done
        energia - the energy remaining

    • Method Detail

      • getNivel

        public int getNivel()
        This returns the current level where's the player
        Returns:
        player current level

      • getMovimentos

        public int getMovimentos()
        This returns the number of movements done by the player
        Returns:
        player's number of movements

      • getEnergia

        public int getEnergia()
        This returns the amount of energy that the player can still spend
        Returns:
        player's amount of energy remaining

      • mostraEstado

        public void mostraEstado()
        This method shows the level, the energy and the number of moves in the game window

      • incrementaMovimentos

        public void incrementaMovimentos()
        This increases in 1 the number of moves

      • decrementaEnergia

        public void decrementaEnergia()
        This method decreases the amount of energy in 4. When the energy it's equal to 0 shows the message "You lost" and closes the game window

      • aumentaEnergia

        public void aumentaEnergia()
        This method increases the amount of energy in 80
